description.localized: Componentes principais de um ambiente de desenvolvimento integrado.

description.default: Additional components of an integrated development environment.
description.localized: Componentes adicionais de um ambiente de desenvolvimento integrado.

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Essential tools for programming in Java, including an editor, debugger, profiler, refactoring support, and award winning drag-and-drop GUI design tool (formerly known as Project Matisse).
description.localized: Ferramentas essenciais para programa\u00E7\u00E3o em Java, incluindo editor, depurador, gerador de perfis, suporte \u00E0 refatora\u00E7\u00E3o e uma ferramenta de design GUI de arrastar e soltar (anteriormente conhecida como Project Matisse).

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Tools for creating Java web and enterprise applications compatible with Java EE specifications. Includes support for servlets, JSPs, tag libraries, Java Server Faces, Java Persistence API, Enterprise Java Beans, JAX-WS and RESTful web services, Spring and Struts.
description.localized: \u7528\u4E8E\u521B\u5EFA\u7B26\u5408 Java EE \u89C4\u8303\u7684 Java Web \u548C\u4F01\u4E1A\u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F\u7684\u5DE5\u5177\u3002\u5305\u62EC\u5BF9 Servlet, JSP, \u6807\u8BB0\u5E93, Java Server Faces, Java \u6301\u4E45\u6027 API, Enterprise Java Beans, JAX-WS \u548C REST \u98CE\u683C\u7684 Web \u670D\u52A1, Spring \u548C Struts \u7684\u652F\u6301\u3002

Ferramentas para cria\u00E7\u00E3o de aplica\u00E7\u00F5es Java web e corporativas compat\u00EDveis com especifica\u00E7\u00F5es Java EE 6. Inclui suporte a servlets, JSPs, bibliotecas de tags, Java server Faces, Java Persistence API, Enterprise Java Beans, Web services do JAX-WS e do RESTful, Spring e Struts.

description.default: Comprehensive tool set for creating Java Micro Edition applications for cell phones and portable devices. Includes visual designer, web services connection wizard, and tools for handling device fragmentation problems.
description.localized: Conjunto completo de ferramentas para cria\u00E7\u00E3o de aplica\u00E7\u00F5es Java Micro Edition para telefone celulares e dispositivos port\u00E1teis. Inclui designer visual, Assistente de conex\u00E3o de Web services e ferramentas para tratamento de problemas de fragmenta\u00E7\u00E3o de dispositivo.

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Tools for developing HTML5 web applications, Node.js applications and Cordova applications, both on the desktop, as well as with iOS and Android devices. Includes HTML5/Javascript application project type, page inspector and visual CSS style editor, editors for HTML, JavaScript, CSS, SASS and LESS, and a JavaScript debugger.
description.localized: \u7528\u4E8E\u5728\u684C\u9762\u4EE5\u53CA iOS \u548C Android \u8BBE\u5907\u4E0A\u5F00\u53D1 HTML5 Web \u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F, Node.js \u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F\u548C Cordova \u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F\u7684\u5DE5\u5177\u3002\u5305\u62EC HTML5/Javascript \u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F\u9879\u76EE\u7C7B\u578B, \u9875\u68C0\u67E5\u5668\u548C\u53EF\u89C6 CSS \u6837\u5F0F\u7F16\u8F91\u5668, \u7528\u4E8E HTML, JavaScript, CSS, SASS \u548C LESS \u7684\u7F16\u8F91\u5668, \u4EE5\u53CA JavaScript \u8C03\u8BD5\u5668\u3002

Ferramentas para desenvolver aplica\u00E7\u00F5es web HTML5, aplica\u00E7\u00F5es Node.js e Cordova, no desktop e tamb\u00E9m com dispositivos iOS e Android. Inclui tipo de projeto de aplica\u00E7\u00E3o HTML5/Javascript, inspetor de p\u00E1gina e editor visual no estilo CSS, editores para HTML, JavaScript, CSS, SASS e LESS, al\u00E9m de um depurador JavaScript.

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Tools for developing PHP applications, including PHP editor and debugger, project management, integration with Apache server, support for MySQL and other databases, FTP upload and download, JavaScript support and other features.
description.localized: Ferramentas para desenvolvimento de aplica\u00E7\u00F5es PHP, incluindo editor PHP e depurador, gerenciamento de projeto, integra\u00E7\u00E3o com servidor Apache, suporte para MySQL e outros bancos de dados, upload e download de FTP, suporte a JavaScript e outras funcionalidades.

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Tools for developing C and C++ applications. Includes project templates, support for existing projects, advanced editor, debug support, and makefile wizard for configuration management.
description.localized: Ferramentas para desenvolvimento de aplica\u00E7\u00F5es C e C++. Inclui projetos modelo, suporte a projetos existentes, editor avan\u00E7ado, suporte a depura\u00E7\u00E3o e assistente para gerenciamento de configura\u00E7\u00F5es.

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Provides support for the Groovy language and the Grails framework.
description.localized: Proporciona suporte para a linguagem Groovy e para o framework Grails.

description.default: Comprehensive tool set for creating Java Card Connected 3 servlets, extended applets and classic applets (backward compatible with Java Card 2.2.x and Java Card Classic). Includes Debugging, multiple Java Card Platform/Device creation and works seamlessly with the publicly available Java Card Reference Implementation.
description.localized: \u7528\u4E8E\u521B\u5EFA Java Card Connected 3 Servlet, \u6269\u5C55\u5C0F\u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F\u548C\u4F20\u7EDF\u5C0F\u5E94\u7528\u7A0B\u5E8F\u7684\u7EFC\u5408\u5DE5\u5177\u96C6 (\u5411\u540E\u517C\u5BB9 Java Card 2.2.x \u548C Java Card Classic)\u3002\u5305\u62EC\u8C03\u8BD5\u529F\u80FD\u548C\u591A Java Card \u5E73\u53F0/\u8BBE\u5907\u521B\u5EFA\u529F\u80FD, \u5E76\u4E14\u53EF\u4E0E\u516C\u5F00\u53D1\u5E03\u7684 Java Card \u5F15\u7528\u5B9E\u73B0\u5F88\u597D\u5730\u914D\u5408\u4F7F\u7528\u3002

Conjunto completo de ferramentas para criar servlets Java Card Connected 3, applets estendidos e applets cl\u00E1ssicos (compat\u00EDveis com vers\u00F5es anteriores do Java Card 2.2.x e Java Card Classic). Inclui a depura\u00E7\u00E3o, a cria\u00E7\u00E3o de v\u00E1rias plataformas/dispositivos Java Card e trabalha diretamente com a implementa\u00E7\u00E3o de refer\u00EAncia do Java Card publicamente dispon\u00EDvel.

product.platforms: windows linux solaris-sparc solaris-x86 macosx-ppc macosx-x86

description.default: Provides faster startup and improved responsiveness by turning on the installed features only when they are required. It is the perfect balance between rich functionality and low memory/CPU consumption. If memory/CPU is not a limited resource for you, feel free to disable this item and get all NetBeans IDE functionality at once.
description.localized: Fornece melhor tempo de resposta e uma inicializa\u00E7\u00E3o mais r\u00E1pida ao ativar as funcionalidades instaladas somente quando elas s\u00E3o necess\u00E1rias. \u00C9 o equil\u00EDbrio perfeito entre riqueza de funcionalidades e baixo consumo de mem\u00F3ria/CPU. Caso a mem\u00F3ria/CPU n\u00E3o seja um recurso limitado na sua m\u00E1quina, sinta-se \u00E0 vontade para desativar este item e obter de uma s\u00F3 vez toda a funcionalidade do NetBeans IDE.
